trans-unit.source: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.
trans-unit.target: Bevat informatie over de gebeurtenis die wordt geactiveerd wanneer een venster is gesloten.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to window-closed events, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, specifying <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a WindowClosedEventArgs parameter.
trans-unit.target: Abonneren op gebeurtenissen venster is gesloten, roepen <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, geven <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent>in de `eventId` parameter en het leveren van een [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] gebeurtenis-handler die een parameter WindowClosedEventArgs.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer uw toepassing een gebeurtenis venster is gesloten, ontvangt de `sender` parameter van de gebeurtenis-handler kan niet worden gebruikt om informatie te verkrijgen over het venster is gesloten, omdat de bijbehorende [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is niet meer geldig.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.
trans-unit.target: De runtime-id van het venster is gesloten.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] die zijn gekoppeld aan deze gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer uw toepassing een gebeurtenis venster is gesloten, ontvangt de `sender` parameter van de gebeurtenis-handler kan niet worden gebruikt om informatie te verkrijgen over het venster is gesloten, omdat de bijbehorende [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is niet meer geldig.

trans-unit.source: Use GetRuntimeId to match the window with a known identifier.
trans-unit.target: GetRuntimeId gebruiken om het venster met een bekende id.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the window on which the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: De [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] van het venster waarop de gebeurtenis is voorgevallen.
